name: White Mocha Peppermint
description: This is a white chocolate peppermint mocha recipe, that utilizes RY4 and Irish Cream to create a great mocha base.
author: ENYAWREKLAW

reviews.text: Absolutely delicious and pretty accurate mix. I have hated every single coffee flavor I have ever tried. Every one tastes like burnt popcorn to me. With the mix of chocolate milk, Irish cream, and soho, I get the essence of a dark roasted note without the usual off notes. Thanks for sharing this great recipe!
